lead_paragraph: OLNICK--Sylvia. AJC and the AJC Women's Leadership Board mourn the passing of our beloved friend. With a passion for Israel, the Jewish people, and the rights and dignity of all, Sylvia for decades dedicated herself to a range of philanthropic causes. A longtime member of the AJC Women's Leadership Board, she was honored in 2003 by AJC Palm Beach for her exceptional leadership. We send our heartfelt condolences to her beloved daughters, Barbara Lane and Nancy Olnick Spanu, and their families. AJC CEO David Harris Chair, AJC Women's Leadership Board Cori Berger 1/3
